Keywords: Robot , S.W.O.R.D.
Real Name: Vision
Special Powers
NATURALLY, THE SHIP OF THESEUS IS AN ARTIFACT IN A MUSEUM: Plasticity. // Adjacent opposing characters can't use improved abilities.
WANDA MAXIMOFF MUST BE NEUTRALIZED, YOU MUST BE DESTROYED: Flurry, Phasing/Teleport. When The Vision uses Phasing/Teleport, after resolutions it can use Flurry as FREE.
I AM VISION: Invincible, Super Senses, Willpower. Protected: Outwit.
I REQUEST ELABORATION: Outwit, Shape Change. When The Vision uses Shape Change and succeeds, after resolutions heal it 1 click.
